page.title: 10GIFFNOCK : BRAIDBAR
page.content:
Giffnock used to be a village in its own right, but now has become one of the South-side Suburbs of{GLASGOW}
In the North of Giffnock was a{QUARRY} where much of the{grey}sandstone used in the building of the famous Glasgow{ {tenements}originated
The quarry was known as Braidbar Quarry, and it is in this area that{ {BRAIDBAR PRIMARY SCHOOL}was built ten years ago
The building is only two storeys high because otherwise there is always the risk that the school might sink into the old quarry tunnels beneath !!
